Package com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.factory

Class WSWRLInternalFactory

java.lang.Object
org.swrlapi.factory.SWRLAPIInternalFactory
com.sebastienguillemin.wswrl.factory.WSWRLInternalFactory
public class WSWRLInternalFactory extends org.swrlapi.factory.SWRLAPIInternalFactory
Static factory that creates requirements for other factories. Extends SWRLAPIInternalFactory.

      public static org.swrlapi.bridge.SWRLBridge getBridge(WSWRLOntology ontology)

      public static WSWRLBuiltinInvoker getWSWRLlBuiltinInvoker(WSWRLOntology ontology)
      Creates a DefaultWSWRLBuiltinInvoker from an ontolory. DefaultWSWRLBuiltinInvoker instance is a singleton instance.
      Parameters:
